description:
[Important : this is my old game posted on gamejolt before, i made this when i was in highschool like 5 years ago and i lost this project on my laptop, so this game won't make it through full version, but dont worry i already make another horror game project, stay tune]

This is "Slender" Like games but slender replaced by a Pocong, and yes, this is an early acces game because this game contains only 1 stage, the stage where you have to collect 8 skulls. u just have 1 flashlight and u have to find some batteries to make that flashlight last longer.

-Press 'P' to Pause the game -Press 'E' to Pickup item (battery,skulls)

I'll add some stage later to finish this game...

What Is Pocong? A pocong, also known as wrapped ghost, is an Indonesian/Malaysian ghost that is said to be the soul of a dead person trapped in its shroud. Known in Indonesia/Malaysia as kain kafan, the shroud is the prescribed length of cloth used in Muslim burials to wrap the body of the dead person. The dead body is covered in white fabric tied over the head, under the feet, and on the neck.

According to traditional beliefs, the soul of a dead person will stay on the Earth for 40 days after the death. If the ties over the shroud are not released after 40 days, the body is said to jump out from the grave to warn people that the soul needs to be released. After the ties are released, the soul will leave the Earth forever. Because of the tie under the feet, the ghost can't walk. This causes the pocong to hop like a rabbit. They also have the ability to fly and teleport.

But In this game, i only give him Teleport Ability ;)

sorry for my bad english, i'm from indonesia, i make this game myself (actually my friend make the ghost (pocong) but after that, i'm on my own) #adventure #horror
